content.rendered:
Directed by Nick Collett.

Written by Oliver Taylor.

Cast Kate O’Flynn (Fiona). Amy James-Kelly (Rachel). Harry Connor (Aaron). Ali Khan (Joshua). Morgana Robinson (Melissa). Lolly Adefope (Miss Simmonds). Arsher Ali (Elder Samson). Kadiff Kirwan (Andrew). Liam Williams (Joel).Al Roberts. Soph Galustian. Kath Hughes (Sid). Lloyd Griffith. Seb Cardinal. Emma Edmondson. Beth Vyse. Karl Cam (Adrian). Mekhi Nangai. Lekhani Chirwa

Language English.

Producers Tony Hernandez. Dillon Mapletoft. Nicki Perkins. Brooke Posch. Laura Riseam. Molly Seymour. Oliver Taylor.

Production Channel 4 Television. Jax Media. Universal International Studios.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 6

Status OnGoing (2023–)
